dialogues.prompt: Hellooooooo caller! Heard you got some important information for the other truth-searching bedheads out there is that right?

responses.text: Wooooo I'm on the Eddy Beddy Bedtime Cast!!!! Life is complete!!!

dialogues.prompt: Love the enthusiasm fella! Now what you got to tell the people out there?

responses.text: I met THE Magic Darren in person!
This is gonna be a lot. Hidden among us, some so-called 'people'... are actually horses trying to get us to eat more sugar.
Ummm... I think I heard Milly Pead stays up past her bedtime...

dialogues.prompt: THE Magic Darren! That's incredible! Tell me more about that, what was he like?

responses.text: He smelt a lot like batteries
He gave me some magic plant juice. I think it's holy?
He gave me a little peck on my cheeks and told me we are all special and to keep ordering from Spreadshop

dialogues.prompt: Wow, that really makes you think. Producer, pull up that video we have of Magic Darren doing a kickflip over me for the folks on stream.

responses.text: Wow, I bet that would be a really special video to watch, but one that is probably really hard to animate in a short space of time.

dialogues.prompt: Well, thanks for sharing the important word, friend. Listeners, make sure to tell everyone you know about this vital information. And caller, thanks for your time, and remember...

responses.text: WE SNOOZE BUT WE DON'T LOOOOSE!!!

dialogues.prompt: Hahaha that's right, fella. Thanks for calling, keep listening
No. Way. That is the single biggest piece of news we've had in almost 2,000 episodes of the Eddy Beddy Bedtime cast. Can you tell me what your source is?

responses.text: My source has asked to remain anonymous.... oh it's too exciting, my source is... MIKE!

dialogues.prompt: WOW folks, that is HUGE. Mike is the most honest kid in the town, this is gonna be big. Tell me caller, what is it these horse people want?

responses.text: They're forcing everyone to eat more sweets, due to their interwoven involvement in...

dialogues.prompt: Well let's pull up that video we have on Big Sugar to inform the people at home. In the meantime caller thanks for your time and remember...

responses.text: WE SNOOZE BUT WE DON'T LOOOOSE!!!

dialogues.prompt: WOAH NO NO NO. Producer, cut this one off. Eddy Beddy has apologised for this and accepts these accusations are baseless and Milly Pead is a wonderful person with great talent and good manners. Caller, please don't pull this again. Bye.
